original_text: There was a garden near the place where they had killed Jesus on the cross. In that garden there was a place where they could put the bodies of dead people. It was a new hole in the rock, where nobody had ever put a dead body before.
korean_text: 예수께서 십자가에 못 박히신 곳에 동산이 있고 동산 안에 아직 사람을 장사한 일이 없는 새 무덤이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: where they had killed Jesus on the cross
In that garden there was a place
where they could put the bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 시신을 둘 수 있는 곳

sentences.original_text: It was a new hole in the rock
where nobody had ever put a dead body
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 시신을 넣어본 적 없는 곳
